Title: Skeleton Crew
Plot: In an attempt to end the standoff on Sainte Marina, Marcus and Sam enter into tense negotiations with the U.S. Government. Meanwhile, when a critical system fails, Grace must take command of the Colorado on a perilous repair operation.
ParentalRatingReason: M Violence,drug use and sex scenes
GuestStars: Jay Karnes, April Grace, Omid Abtahi, Michael Ng, Bruce Davison, Jay Hernandez
